TEXT.TITLE: BLOCKBUSTER <BBEC> UNIT SIGNS EXCLUSIVE LICENSE
TEXT.BODY: Blockbuster Entertainment Corp said its Blockbuster Distribution Corp unit granted an exclusive license agreement to <Video Superstore Management Inc>. Blockbuster said the license gives Video the right to own and operate its Blockbuster Videos Rental Superstores for the Milwaukee, Wis., area. Reuter
